Container.Name: Serviio
Container.Overview: Serviio is a free media server. It allows you to stream your media files (music, video or images) to renderer devices,(e.g. a TV set, Bluray player, games console or mobile phone) on your connected home network.
Container.Description: Serviio is a free media server. It allows you to stream your media files (music, video or images)[br][b]IMPORTANT :- YOU MUST CHANGE THE HOST PORT FOR PORT 80 BELOW, for the web interface to work.[/b][br][br][b]Map /var/www/serviio to save config etc.. and map /MEDIA to your media on unraid..[br]You can add additional mappings if needed.
